scourge.translation[0].definitions[0].de: something that causes a lot of harm or suffering
scourge.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a whip used to punish people in the past
scourge.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to cause a lot of harm or suffering to a place or group of people
scourge.translation[1].definitions[1].de: to hit someone with a whip as punishment in the past
